alert.note: Alert for Delta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 12 at 10:30AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Michigan... Sturgeon River near Nahma Junction affecting Delta County. .Snow melt will cause the river flows to become high. Expect minor flooding downstream. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 230 AM EDT. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by snowmelt are occurring. * WHERE...Sturgeon River near Nahma Junction. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water overflows the banks along the river * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
